short_description_localized.en: The Michelangelo’s 42-square-meter/495-square-foot Studio Rooms offer genuine Italian luxury, with a king-size bed, spacious entrance foyer and seating area, and lavish marble bathroom.

description_localized.en: The 42-square-meter/495-square-foot Studio Rooms of our boutique hotel in New York offer genuine Italian luxury, with king-size beds, spacious entrance foyers and seating areas, and lavish marble bathrooms. Elegant neoclassical lines work with a soothing color palette and bold Empire-style cherry wood furniture. Max 2 guests

Elegant neoclassical lines work with a soothing color palette and bold Empire-style cherry wood furniture. Max 2 guests

images.name: Studio-Room---495sqf---42sqm-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 450 - 500 square foot room, featuring one King size bed against the side wall with two night stands on each side with a phone and a alarm clock, and sitting bench at the foot of the bed. Across from the bed there is an armoire with dresser drawers and a 43 inch flat screen TV. Next to the armoire you will find a fully stocked mini bar, including wine, bottled beverages and assorted snacks available for purchase. Located near the window there are two comfortable armchairs with an ottoman and side table.  The room also features a full size work desk, an Italian marble bathroom with a 55 gallon soaking tub. Wall decor includes a wall mirror and Italian inspired artwork.
